# SpunkArt — Digital Art & Ordinals on Bitcoin

> SpunkArt is a digital art studio creating Bitcoin ordinal inscriptions and NFT collections. Home of the Spunk.Bet network. Follow @SpunkArt13.


SpunkArt creates digital art collections inscribed as Bitcoin ordinals. Collections include The Damned, Crazy Aliens, Dreamers, The Freak Show, and Bitcoin Faces. All art is permanently stored on the Bitcoin blockchain. SpunkArt also operates the Spunk.Bet free crypto casino, the Predict Network (18 prediction market sites), the Stimulant Network (wiki, doctor, shop), and scam exposure sites.

- [Contact — Commissions & Collaborations](https://spunkart.com/#contact)


## Keywords

Bitcoin ordinals, digital art, NFT art, Bitcoin inscriptions, SpunkArt, crypto art, ordinal collections


## Collections

- **The Damned**: Dark surreal portraits inscribed on Bitcoin
- **Crazy Aliens**: Vibrant alien character art
- **Dreamers**: Ethereal dream-state illustrations
- **The Freak Show**: Bold circus-themed digital art
- **Bitcoin Faces**: Portrait series on Bitcoin ordinals
